docs.snippet: A U.S. Air Force investigation into exam cheating by America's nuclear missile officers has widened, with roughly double the original 34 officers now under review, a U.S. official said on Tuesday, speaking on condition of anonymity....

docs.snippet: Apple reshaped technology and society when Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone seven years ago. Now, the trend-setting company is losing ground to rivals that offer what Apple has stubbornly refused to make: smartphones with lower prices and larger scr...

headline.main: Pressure Mounts for Apple to Expand Its Horizons
headline.print_headline: Pressure Mounts for Apple to Expand Its Horizons

docs.lead_paragraph: Apple reshaped technology and society when Steve Jobs unveiled the iPhone seven years ago. Now, the trend-setting company is losing ground to rivals that offer what Apple has stubbornly refused to make: smartphones with lower prices and larger screens than the iPhone.

docs.snippet: Television news viewers proved curious about ABC anchor Elizabeth Vargas' battle with alcoholism, with her return to "20/20" on Friday night earning the newsmagazine's biggest audience in four years....

headline.main: ABC Anchor Vargas' Return Interests TV Viewers
headline.print_headline: ABC Anchor Vargas' Return Interests TV Viewers

docs.lead_paragraph: Television news viewers proved curious about ABC anchor Elizabeth Vargas' battle with alcoholism, with her return to "20/20" on Friday night earning the newsmagazine's biggest audience in four years.
